author: Taylor Borden
title: Social distancing could be the best way to slow the spread of the coronavirus. Here are the 13 states practicing it the best based on smartphone location data, ranked.
description: The majority of the country is under a stay-at-home order which asks residents to only go out for essential services like buying food and medicine. Unacast, a location and data analytics firm, analyzed how well states are handling social distancing. Unacast u…
content:
Social distancing has been recommended by the CDC as the best way to slow the spread of the coronavirus.
Social distancing, according to Johns Hopkins Medicine, consists of "deliberately increasing the physical space between people to avoid spreading illness… [+1582 chars]
